text: Carla Mendonça (born 25 October 1961) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the roles of Sophie Johnson in the CITV children's sitcom My Parents Are Aliens (2001–2006), and Mrs. Fitzgerald in the CBBC series So Awkward (2015–2016). In 2021, she began appearing as Orla Crawshaw in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street. She has a degree in Theatre Studies and Dramatic Art from the University of Warwick. ==Other websites== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:People from Coventry
title: Carla Mendonça
